sentences.en: a land laid waste by war.
sentences.cn: 被战争完全毁坏的国家。

sentences.en: a land laid waste by war.
sentences.cn: 被战争完全毁坏的国家。

sentences.en: All garden waste should be composted and returned to the garden.
sentences.cn: 应该把花园里所有枯萎的花草制成堆肥，然后再用它们给花园施肥。

sentences.en: As the lungs exhale this waste, gas is expelled into the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 肺呼出这些废气被排到空气中。

sentences.en: excessive waste in state spending
sentences.cn: 政府支出方面的过度浪费

sentences.en: German law forbids the dumping of hazardous waste on German soil.
sentences.cn: 德国法律禁止在德国本土倾倒有害废料。

sentences.en: I dis-covered a mutilated cassette stuffed in a waste-basket.
sentences.cn: 我发现一盘被弄坏的盒式磁带丢在废纸篓里。

sentences.en: I think that is a total waste of money.
sentences.cn: 我认为那完全是浪费金钱。

sentences.en: It seemed a pity to let it all go to waste.
sentences.cn: 让这一切白白浪费掉，真是可惜了。

sentences.en: Leaving the heating on all the time wastes electricity.
sentences.cn: 让暖气整天开着是浪费电力。

sentences.en: Let's not waste an opportunity to see the children.
sentences.cn: 咱们别错过了看孩子们的机会。

sentences.en: Mexican cookery is economical, she says. Nothing goes to waste.
sentences.cn: “墨西哥的烹调注重俭省，”她说，“任何东西都不会浪费。”

sentences.en: The ability to separate out reusable elements from other waste is crucial.
sentences.cn: 能从其他废料中分离出可重复利用成分是很关键的。

sentences.en: The aphid is now laying waste to the wheat and barley fields.
sentences.cn: 蚜虫正在毁掉一片片的小麦和大麦田地。

sentences.en: The emphasis now is on recycling waste.
sentences.cn: 目前的重点是废弃物的再利用。

sentences.en: The waste is safely locked away until it is no longer radioactive.
sentences.cn: 废料被安全储存起来，直到其不再有辐射性。

sentences.en: There was a patch of waste land behind the church.
sentences.cn: 教堂的后面有一块荒地。

sentences.en: They make compost out of all kinds of waste.
sentences.cn: 他们用各种废料制造堆肥。

sentences.en: This machine wastes a lot of energy.
sentences.cn: 这台机器消耗能源很大。

sentences.en: Why waste £50 when you could get it for free?
sentences.cn: 能够免费得到为什么还要浪费50英镑呢？

sentences.en: You could waste your whole life on a pipe-dream.
sentences.cn: 白日梦会荒废你一生。

words.tran_cn: 浪费的，不经济的；奢侈的
[环境] 废品；挥霍者，浪费者
浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物

phrases.tran_cn: 固体废物，固态废物；固体废料，固体垃圾
徒费口舌：费了口舌却一无所获
废物处理；废物处理装置

trans.tran_en: waste materials, substances etc are unwanted because the good part of them has been removed

trans.tran_cn: 浪费，滥用，糟蹋，废料，垃圾，荒原，沙漠
trans.tran_en: when something such as money or skills are not used in a way that is effective, useful, or sensible

trans.tran_cn: 浪费，滥用，白费，错过(机会)
trans.tran_en: to use more money, time, energy etc than is useful or sensible
when something such as money or skills are not used in a way that is effective, useful, or sensible
to use more money, time, energy etc than is useful or sensible
